title: Superstar, No Big Deal?! - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Orphans   Power Couple   R*pe   Second Chance   S*xual Abuse   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Tragic Past   Transmigration
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
This is the story of a superstar reborn as a small wallflower in the entertainment world.

Four years after his death, Jing Anjue has been reborn in the body of an obscure idol. As Shan Yatong, he embarks on his journey again, striving to reconquer what was once his domain — the entertainment circle.

Along the way, the new Shan Yatong catches the eyes of quite a few people within the industry. This includes: the current reigning Superstar, a fellow popular young idol, and a CEO who has history with the previous Jing Anjue. But everyone will find it is not so easy to win his heart, as Shan Yatong is now a trailblazer with a heart of ice.>
